body.body: The Event Control project is a comprehensive platform for managing and running robotics tournaments, built to replace the VEX Tournament manager. It covers all stages from event setup to live match control and scoring. The system integrates UI and database layers to ensure seamless tournament operations, designed to withstand network drops and poor WiFi often found in tournament venues.
